snippet: Colin Myler, the last editor of the now closed British newspaper The News of the World, will succeed Kevin Convey.
abstract: Colin Myler, the last editor of the now closed British newspaper The News of the World, will succeed Kevin Convey.

byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and RAVI SOMAIYA

lead_paragraph: The Daily News of New York on Wednesday appointedColin Myler, a former editor of the recently closed News of the World tabloid in London, its editor in chief.

headline.main: New York Daily News Picks as Editor Colin Myler, Formerly of News of the World
